definition: natural person (law)/see also 法人[fa3 ren2]
to let nature take its course (idiom)
habit becomes nature (idiom); get used to something and it seems inevitable/second nature
to let things take their course (idiom)/to leave it to nature/laissez-faire
a calm heart keeps you cool (idiom)
effort will undoubtedly lead to success (idiom)

sentences.english: Jiangnan porcelain place, nature has a strong tea.
sentences.chinese: 江南有陶瓷的地方，自然有着濃郁的茶香。

sentences.english: I take care of my new T-shirt as a matter of course.
sentences.chinese: 我很小心我的新T恤，這是很自然的事。

sentences.english: This is the color of hopefulness, and of our connection to nature.
sentences.chinese: 這種顏色代表着希望，以及我們和自然的關聯。

sentences.english: Adorno attempts to build real nature aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 阿多諾力圖建立真正的自然美學。

sentences.english: This god was not identified with nature.
sentences.chinese: 上帝已經不再等同於自然了。

sentences.english: Many natural resources are being overdeveloped.
sentences.chinese: 許多自然資源被過分開發。

sentences.english: You have no feeling for the beauty of nature.
sentences.chinese: 大自然的美缺乏欣賞力。

sentences.english: Fine texture, uniform color-make-up to show you natural luster, and the makeup is not easily come off.
sentences.chinese: 質地細緻，上色均勻，不易脫妝，妝效呈現自然光澤。

sentences.english: Oil-free compressors of course, are the logical choice for instrument-air supplies.
sentences.chinese: 自然，無油壓縮機必然被選擇爲儀用空氣供給者。

sentences.english: Moral criteria are nature, the Tao, artificiality and manner.
sentences.chinese: 自然，道，人爲，禮儀等道德標準。

sentences.english: If you make the company better and better, profits will naturally follow.
sentences.chinese: 公司越做越好，利潤自然隨之而來。

sentences.english: Nature must be gladsome when I was so happy.
sentences.chinese: 當我欣喜萬分的時候，大自然也一定非常高興。

sentences.english: Flood and drought are the predominant natural disasters in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 水旱災害是湖南省最嚴重的自然災害。

sentences.english: Is natural diet right for your ferret ?
sentences.chinese: 自然的飲食來源對貂是好的嗎？

sentences.english: The superior natural conditions of Wannan mountainous region make it one of China's better tea producing regions.
sentences.chinese: 皖南山區自然條件優越，是我國重點產茶區之一。

sentences.english: Their personality bearing and the nobility of the character compels obedience naturally.
sentences.chinese: 他們的氣質舉止和高尚的性格讓人們自然而然地折服。

definition: only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
to be certain/to be positive/assuredly/definitely/to give recognition/to affirm/affirmative (answer)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
Tongli, a city in Jiangsu Province, China
